tool_description: Loads and customizes invoice templates with layout preferences, field positioning, and formatting options for professional invoice presentation.

template_name.description: Name of the invoice template to load

page_size.description: Page size for the invoice (A4, Letter, Legal)

include_logo.description: Whether to include company logo in template

error_messages: Template not found: The specified template name does not exist. Use a valid template name from available options.
Invalid page size: Page size must be A4, Letter, or Legal. Specify a supported page size.
Color scheme unavailable: The specified color scheme is not available for this template. Choose an available color option.
Header style invalid: Header style must be minimal, standard, or detailed. Select a valid header style option.
usage: Specify template_name to load a specific invoice template. Optionally customize with page_size, color_scheme, logo preferences, and header_style for desired appearance.

template_structure.description: Loaded template structure with formatting specifications

available_fields.description: List of available fields that can be populated in this template
